Contact Details: Department for Communities Telephone: 028 9082 9000 Professional Services Unit Level 6 Causeway Exchange, 1-7 Bedford Street, Belfast BT2 7EG Tele: 028 9051 5424 email: psu@communities-ni.gov.uk
Description: The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing. The report is divided into sections covering: supply, energy, social renting demand, private renting demand, owner occupier demand and household characteristics.
Name: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics
Notes: The Homelessness element of this data set seems to be purely a summary of data contained in the Northern Ireland homelessness bulletin data set (see below).
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified as latest version via link entitled Northern Ireland Housing Statistics [year] towards top part of page under heading Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report. This opens a new page with a series of six spreadsheets under the heading Documents entitled Northern Ireland Housing Statistics [year] labelled Section 1 to Section 6. Homelessness data contained in table of Section 3, tab T3_8 to T3_11.
Sizing Notes: 12 tables with different aspects.  needs some up front work to determine how to handle the dimensions / split into datasets.  Should be straightforward to extract data. Homelessness data contained in table of Section 3, tabs T3_8 to T3_11 but seems to be purely a summary of data contained in the Northern Ireland homelessness bulletin dataset (see below).
